page.title: 04ART AND CRAFT-POTTERY
page.content: {Mrs Airton is a part-time potter} living in St. Merryn village.She started making pottery a year ago .She sells her work in gift shops and to her friends at work. To make her pottery she uses casting slip and earthenware clay. Mrs Airton mostly makes{mugs and {fashion broaches.}She only has time to do her pottery evenings and weekends. The other thing she likes doing between pottery is gardening. The tools she uses for pottery are knives,sponges ,moulds and a kiln. Zell Osborn is the potter who has most influenced Mrs Airton's work.
